titles: The best gift, or God's call upon young men for their hearts Delivered in a sermon to young men. By Thomas Vincent, minister sometime of Maudlins Milkstreet, London.
author: Vincent, Thomas, 1634-1678.
publisher: printed for George Calvert and Samuel Sprint, and are to be sold at the Golden Ball in Duck Lane,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the Congregational Library, London.
keywords: Young men --  Conduct of life --  Early works to 1800.
